sentences.en: Amid these jarring events Collin felt one thing to be indispensable.
sentences.cn: 在这种龃龉的事件之中,克林觉得有一样事非办不可.

sentences.en: An intelligent computer will be an indispensable diagnostic tool for doctors.
sentences.cn: 智能计算机将成为医生不可或缺的诊断工具。

sentences.en: Cars have become an indispensable part of our lives.
sentences.cn: 汽车已成了我们生活中必不可少的一部分。

sentences.en: Diagrams and graphs are indispensable visual aids in many aspects of economics.
sentences.cn: 图形和图解在经济学的许多方面是重要的形象工具.

sentences.en: Dictionaries are indispensable in English study.
sentences.cn: 学英语,词典是少不得的.

sentences.en: Dr. Morgenstern's indispensable assistance in this regard is gratefully acknowledged.
sentences.cn: 我们对于莫根施特恩博士在这方面给予的不可缺少的协助深表感谢.

sentences.en: For a successful class humour is indispensable.
sentences.cn: 要在课堂上取得成功,幽默是必不可少的.

sentences.en: It is universally acknowledged that trees are indispensable to us.
sentences.cn: 全世界都知道树木对我们是不可或缺的.

sentences.en: It was flattering to be told how indispensable his taste and talent were.
sentences.cn: 被告知自己的品味和才能如此不可或缺，他心里非常高兴。

sentences.en: Mobile phones have become an indispensable part of our lives.
sentences.cn: 移动电话已经成为我们生活中的必需品。

sentences.en: She was becoming indispensable to him.
sentences.cn: 他已变得越来越离不开她了。
这些是不可缺少的附件.

sentences.en: They were all men who were indispensable about a house.
sentences.cn: 他们都是家里缺少不得的人手.
这是一本必不可少的书.

sentences.en: This is an indispensable organization, but an organization that can only work because of the staff and their contribution and your dedication.
sentences.cn: 联合国是一个必不可少的组织，但也是一个全因有了其全体职员的贡献及他们的奉献才能运作的组织。

sentences.en: This is an indispensable part of his creed.
sentences.cn: 这是他的信条中必不可少的一部分.

sentences.en: To be without some of the things you wan is an indispensable part of happiness.
sentences.cn: 你追求不到的东西有时也是幸福不可缺少的一部分。

words.tran_cn: 不可缺少；必要；责无旁贷

trans.tran_cn: 不可缺少的，绝对必要的，责无旁贷的，不可避开的
trans.tran_en: someone or something that is indispensable is so important or useful that it is impossible to manage without them

trans.tran_cn: 不可缺少之物；必不可少的人
